scripts.dev-docker: docker build -t zjs -f Dockerfile.development ./ && docker run -it -p 127.0.0.1:3000:3000 -v $(pwd)/pages:/app/pages -v $(pwd)/public:/app/public -v $(pwd)/styles:/app/styles zjs
scripts.deploy-docker: docker build -t zjs -f Dockerfile.deployment ./ && docker run -it -p 127.0.0.1:3000:3000 zjs
